synopsis.text:
Not long after a devastating nuclear war wiped out most of humanity in 199X, the world has become a ruthless wasteland teeming with thieves, killers, and warlords. In these desperate times, one man stands above the rest: Raoh, the unrivaled master of the deadly martial art known as Hokuto Shinken. This divine fighting style targets pressure points, rendering it virtually unbeatable.

Before Kenshiro claimed the title of the Fist of the North Star, Raoh, his oldest brother and frequent adversary, held the mantle of the ultimate warrior and assassin. Alongside his loyal steed Kokuro-ko, the cunning Souga, and the spirited Reina, Raoh embarks on a mission to conquer the remnants of mankind.

In this prequel to the legendary Fist of the North Star saga, witness the untold story of the world before Kenshiro and the rise of the formidable conqueror, Raoh. As he takes the future of this savage world into his powerful hands, the greatest battle is about to unfold in Legends of the Dark King ~ Fist of the North Star.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
